properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

activities.name: GetMaxWatermarkValue
activities.description: Query the source object to get the max value from watermark column

activities.name: DeltaLoadOneObject
activities.description: Copy the changed data only from last time via comparing the value in watermark column to identify changes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).schema}].[@{json(item().SourceObjectSettings).table}] 
    where [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] > @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, 
    concat('''', json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnStartValue, ''''))}
    and [@{json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnName}] <= @{if(contains(json(item().DataLoadingBehaviorSettings).watermarkColumnType, 'Int'),
    activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, 
    concat('''', activity('GetMaxWatermarkValue').output.firstRow.CurrentMaxWaterMarkColumnValue, ''''))}

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

properties.description: This pipeline will copy one batch of objects. The objects belonging to this batch will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: DivideOneBatchIntoMultipleGroups
activities.description: Divide objects from single batch into multiple sub parallel groups to avoid reaching the output limit of lookup activity.

activities.name: GetObjectsPerGroupToCopy
activities.description: Get objects (tables etc.) from control table required to be copied in this group. The order of objects to be copied following the TaskId in control table (ORDER BY [TaskId] DESC).

activities.name: CopyObjectsInOneGroup
activities.description: Execute another pipeline to copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

properties.description: This pipeline will count the total number of objects (tables etc.) required to be copied in this run, come up with the number of sequential batches based on the max allowed concurrent copy task, and then execute another pipeline to copy different batches sequentially.

activities.name: GetSumOfObjectsToCopy
activities.description: Count the total number of objects (tables etc.) required to be copied in this run.

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM @{pipeline().parameters.MainControlTableName} where TopLevelPipelineName='@{pipeline().Pipeline}' and TriggerName like '%@{pipeline().TriggerName}%' and CopyEnabled = 1

activities.name: CopyBatchesOfObjectsSequentially
activities.description: Come up with the number of sequential batches based on the max allowed concurrent copy tasks, and then execute another pipeline to copy different batches sequentially.

activities.name: CopyObjectsInOneBatch
activities.description: Execute another pipeline to copy one batch of objects. The objects belonging to this batch will be copied parallelly.

content.query:
USE demo
GO

CREATE LOGIN [test@trainingdustinvannoy.onmicrosoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
ALTER SERVER ROLE sysadmin ADD MEMBER [test1];

-- In your database
CREATE USER test1 FROM LOGIN [test@trainingdustinvannoy.onmicrosoft.com];
ALTER ROLE db_datareader ADD member test1; 

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_datakickstartadls') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_datakickstartadls] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET );
GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'DeltaFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT DeltaLakeFormat WITH (  FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA );
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE area_raw;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE area_raw (
	[area_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[area_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[display_level] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cu/area/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = raw_datakickstartadls,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
	)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE current_raw;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE current_raw (
	[series_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[year] bigint,
	[period] nvarchar(4000),
	[value] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cu/current/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = raw_datakickstartadls,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE series_raw 
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cu/series/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = raw_datakickstartadls,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.area_raw
GO

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Grant access to a user to a single serverless SQL pool database')]

content.query:
--1.a Create LOGIN for an Azure AD account.To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.

CREATE USER [alias@domain.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;


--1.b Create a Login for a SQL authuser. To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.
CREATE LOGIN <login_alias> WITH PASSWORD = 'enter_your_password';
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN <login_alias>

--2.a Create USER for the Azure AD account

use yourdb -- Use your DB name
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN [alias@domain.com]

--2.b Create USER for the SQL Auth account
use yourdb -- Use your DB name
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN <login_alias>

--3.Add USER to members of the specified role

use yourdb -- Use your DB name
go
alter role db_owner Add MEMBER <user_alias> -- Type user alias from step 2

USE demo
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateView @db_folder nvarchar(50), @name nvarchar(50)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [' + @name + '] AS
        SELECT *
        FROM OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/' + @db_folder + '/' + @name + '/*.parquet'',
            FORMAT=''Parquet''
        ) AS [result]
'

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO

USE demo
GO

SELECT 
  paymentType,
  count(1) recordCount,
  avg(tipAmount) avgTip
FROM yellow_trips_delta
WHERE paymentType is not null
--and year_month='2018_12'
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY recordCount desc


SELECT 
  cast(tpepPickupDatetime as date) PickupDate,
  PickupZone,
  Borough,
  count(1) recordCount,
  avg(tipAmount) avgTip
FROM yellow_trips_delta
WHERE paymentType is not null
GROUP BY 
  cast(tpepPickupDatetime as date),
  PickupZone,
  Borough

SELECT 
  pickupDt,
  count(1) recordCount,
  avg(tipAmount) avgTip
FROM yellow_trips_parquet
WHERE paymentType is not null
GROUP BY 
  pickupDt


SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM yellow_trips_delta
WHERE tpepPickupDatetime between '2018-12-01' and '2018-12-02'

USE demo
GO

-- Select data using OPENROWSET (from Synapse autogenerated script)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_delta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


-- Create external table for easy use. Data source and formats must be created the first time (from Synapse autogenerated script)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://demo@datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'yellow_trips_delta')
	DROP EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_delta;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_delta (
	[vendorID] nvarchar(4000),
	[tpepPickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[tpepDropoffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[startLon] float,
	[startLat] float,
	[endLon] float,
	[endLat] float,
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[paymentType] nvarchar(4000),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] nvarchar(4000),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[pickupDt] date,
	[dropoffDt] date,
	[tipPct] float,
	[Borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupZone] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupServiceZone] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_delta/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.yellow_trips_delta
GO


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'yellow_trips_parquet')
	DROP EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_parquet;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_parquet (
	[vendorID] nvarchar(4000),
	[tpepPickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[tpepDropoffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[startLon] float,
	[startLat] float,
	[endLon] float,
	[endLat] float,
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[paymentType] nvarchar(4000),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] nvarchar(4000),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[pickupDt] date,
	[dropoffDt] date,
	[tipPct] float,
	[Borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupZone] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupServiceZone] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_parquet/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.yellow_trips_parquet
GO

ALTER DATABASE sql01
SET AUTO_CREATE_STATISTICS ON;

CREATE TABLE yellow_trips (
	[vendorID] nvarchar(40),
	[tpepPickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[tpepDropoffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(40),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(40),
	[startLon] float,
	[startLat] float,
	[endLon] float,
	[endLat] float,
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] nvarchar(40),
	[paymentType] nvarchar(400),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] nvarchar(400),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[pickupDt] date,
	[dropoffDt] date,
	[tipPct] float,
	[Borough] nvarchar(400),
	[PickupZone] nvarchar(400),
	[PickupServiceZone] nvarchar(400)
	)
WITH (
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (pickupDt)
) 

COPY INTO yellow_trips FROM 'https://datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_parquet/yearMonth=2018_02/*.parquet' WITH (FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET') -- , AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON'

SELECT 
  pickupDt,
  count(1) recordCount,
  avg(tipAmount) avgTip
FROM yellow_trips
WHERE paymentType is not null
GROUP BY 
  pickupDt

  SELECT 
  pickupDt,
  PickupZone,
  Borough,
  count(1) recordCount,
  avg(tipAmount) avgTip
FROM yellow_trips
WHERE paymentType is not null
GROUP BY 
  pickupDt
  ,PickupZone
  ,Borough
HAVING count(1) > 1000

-- This is an example of setting permissions on serverless SQL database
CREATE DATABASE severless_db

use master
go

CREATE LOGIN [test@trainingdustinvannoy.onmicrosoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
go
CREATE LOGIN [synapse_reader] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
go

ALTER SERVER ROLE sysadmin ADD MEMBER [synapse_reader];
--ALTER SERVER ROLE public ADD MEMBER [synapse_reader];

alter role db_datareader add MEMBER [synapse_reader]
GO

alter role db_datareader add MEMBER [synapse_reader]
GO




use [taxi]
GO
CREATE LOGIN [synapse_reader] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
go

use severless_db
go
CREATE USER reader FROM LOGIN [synapse_reader];
go
alter role db_datareader Add member [reader]
go

CREATE VIEW test2 as SELECT * FROM taxi.dbo.yourtablename

Select top 100 *
FROM
	sys.database_role_members rm
    JOIN sys.database_principals AS r ON rm.[role_principal_id] = r.[principal_id]
	JOIN sys.database_principals AS m ON rm.[member_principal_id] = m.[principal_id]
-- WHERE
-- 	r.[type_desc] = 'DATABASE_ROLE';

Select top 100 *
FROM
	sys.server_role_members rm
    JOIN sys.server_principals AS r ON rm.[member_principal_id] = r.[principal_id]
